# `claymer.core`


::: {.sourceClojure}
```clojure
(defn fib [n]
  (nth (map first (iterate (fn [[a b]] [b (+' a b)]) [0 1])) n))
```
:::



::: {.sourceClojure}
```clojure
(defn fib-naive [n]
  (if (<= n 1) n (+ (fib-naive (- n 1)) (fib-naive (- n 2)))))
```
:::
